DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of the effects of different CDP323 doses given over a period of four weeks on blood biomarkers in subjects with relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis.
DOC.criteria: Female and male subjects aged 1865 years Relapsing form of MS with at least one clinical relapse in the 24 months before screening; Screening EDSS score of 06.5; Must be fully immunocompetent Female subjects of childbearing potential must agree to practice contraception methods Any conditions that could interfere with the contrastenhanced MRI; Any clinically significant disease state or findings other than MS; Any clinically significant deviation from the predefined ranges for laboratory tests; Concomitant treatment with MS disease modifying drugs
